doc.after: The water industry provides drinking water and wastewater services including sewage treatment to households and industry Water supply facilities include water wells cisterns for rainwater harvesting water supply networks and water purification facilities water tanks water towers water pipes including old aqueducts Atmospheric water generators are in development
